document.full_text: standard & poor's ratings services on monday affirmed california's a-minus general obligation rating with a negative outlook, but warned any ratings downgrade would likely be related to liquidity problems.
document.title: s&p affirms rating and negative outlook for california
lines_and_colors: standard & poor's ratings services on monday affirmed california's a-minus general obligation rating with a negative outlook, but warned any ratings downgrade would likely be related to liquidity problems.
